projects.name: GO2 Project
projects.short: Upload your location history file and learn everything about your environmental impacts!

projects.name: RSE Explorer
projects.short: CSR commitments from big companies are hard to track. Volunteering with French government and NGO DataforGood, I contributed to this context-aware search engine able to scan all available French extra-financial reports.

projects.name: Name Prediction
projects.short: Some friends of mine are having babies...and a very hard time finding inspiration for the name! This app uses machine learning to match desired character traits with a perfectly suited name. May it be a self-fulfilling prophecy!

projects.name: Kaamebott
projects.short: Struggling to find a landing joke for your next presentation or video script ? This app suggests sentence completion...in the style of Kaamelott dialogue (an awesome French show)
videos: <iframe width="645" height="481" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/kNVMfhi58ac" frameborder="0" allow="autoplay; encrypted-media" allowfullscreen></iframe>

projects.name: Online classes
projects.short: During confinement, my teacher friend was having a hard time doing online classes. Instead, I set up for him a simple web page to publish videos, course contents and exercises

projects.name: GoodPlanet
projects.short: I volunteered with NGO Good Planet to help them gain understanding of the users behavior on the carbon footprint calculators, design a metrics dashboard and improve the experience
